Class Query

java.lang.Object
krystal.framework.database.abstraction.Query
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryExecutionInterface, LoggingInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeleteStatement, GroupByStatement, InsertStatement, OrderByKeyword, SelectStatement, UpdateStatement, WhereClause
public abstract class Query extends Object implements QueryExecutionInterface, LoggingInterface
Base for all SQL related operations. Use factory classes accessible from TableInterface: SelectStatement, UpdateStatement, InsertStatement, DeleteStatement, or manually type with Q factory class.

      public void setProvidersPacked(ProviderInterface provider)
